dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Shhh...! Hey, eat this. Don't act surprised. Just put it in your mouth and chew—no need to thank me, fuhu.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Ughhh... Can we take at least a day or two off from these morning research sessions? I'm still waking up...

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: I think I'll skip lunch today. What? "As I live and breathe..."? That's because, uhh... Well, I snacked a little... too much at the Association library.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: You're going to the late night studies, too? Whew... It's like everyone's nailed their butts to their seats. Wait, did they actually—?!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
I don't mind sharing, but let's keep this out of the head librarian's eyes, okay?
If I get caught snacking again, I don't think it'll end with a weeklong library ban.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
The key to stealthy snacking...? It's all in the eyes. Make the deadest, most zoned-out eyes ever.
Like your brain's been overloaded with so much knowledge... when it's just that your face's been overloaded with pastry.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: They say that there's nothing as seductive as new knowledge... But aren't these freshly cooked delicacies... about as seductive?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
How am I so strong? Sigh, how do you not know something so basic?
Listen up... 'Knowledge is power'.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Our Association has two large divisions: the Keys and the Fists. Which one am I? Fuhu, can'tcha tell? I'll knock some enlightenment into them blockheads with these fists.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Nom... Yes? No ma'am. I was just studying.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: How'd it go again? With knowledge as my key... I shall continue to devote myself to the opening of the door.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Huh? Me?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: No knowledge is earned without pain... or whatever, blah blah...

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Ooh? Is it snack time?!

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Let the truths be self—evident to them.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ignoramuses...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ah!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Get Smacked.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I should've studied... like my seniors always told me to...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Ohh! I know this one!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Agh... But I'm sure I've read about this before?!

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg:
The only abyss is the abyss of ignorance, and... 
And uh... crap. How'd that go again?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Whew, so I'm not falling behind on my studies, right? Hell yeah.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Ugh, maybe I've been eating too much... I feel sluggish, too... I guess I shoulda studied harder...
